Signalcalls connect you with investors and artists, serve you fast and daily breaking news with videos and articles to keep you informed. Let's take a look at some of the features of signalcalls and what makes it so special.

# Features

1. **Free Academy:** Signalcalls provide free academy courses to the basics of both the stock and foreign exchange market for more advanced learning and mastering your trading skills. 
2. **Marketplace:** Signalcalls offer a marketplace where you can shop for mentorship to advance your trading skills. You donâ€™t have to go looking for experts to teach you how to trade the international market and get scammed at the end of the day. Signalcalls makes it easier for you by providing experts in those areas to guide you.
3. **News Update:** Signalcalls provide you daily and fastest market update with videos and articles that shows you how the market moved and upcoming daily report. Signalcalls provide a very fast and accurate market reports to keep you informed and updated.
4. **Opensea Integration:** From your signalcalls app you can purchase NFTs from opensea without navigating out of signalcalls app. 
5. **Community Building:** Signalcalls also support community building. For the first time we will build a community free from bots and spammers. This is something discord can not offer us but signalcalls did.  I'm currently building a community on signalcalls and you are welcome to join my community.
6. **Live Market Charts:** Signalcalls aim is to keep it users updated in the financial market with the live market charts that covers indices, forex and crypto.

Signalcalls have cool features like you connect with your friends on signalcalls, which will notify them whenever you host a twitter space. What other features do you want if not these?
